body: I like ntr and sanagi but that tennis one was bad
The tennis one she said no more misunderstanding yeah ok but if there was an epilogue she would still cheating on her bf maybe on this same guy or other guys, hope the same guy though
Their style's similar to Takeda Hiromitsu, but rounder and softer. Hiromitsu's style's a bit more angular, but I like both.
Wow !! the art very similar with takeda hiromitsu

Dios, no me gusta esto hentai, pensé que me gustaba ver a mujeres siendo humilladas pero, una vez terminado de pjearte y  miras la historia, sientes crueldad, sientes que hiciste algo malo, no es gracioso el netorare, me gusta ese hentai, pero solo para hacerme pajas, en la vida real no haría nada de eso, la infidelidad es cruel, y no tiene ni un pizca de gracia, y creo que esto es más de frustración sexual que de otra cosa, creo que debería matarme a pajas hasta que mi libido no se active en ese tipo e situaciones con algo menos enfermo...
So anyone know where Chapter 6 is?

The problem with the last story is that it ends at the most crucial moment. I want to see what the son will do after learning that his mom is his friend's slut. He will most likely collapse in shock while his friend fuck his mom in front of him and his mom saying that she loves cock more than him  but still I want to see that scene. Then again that's just how a lot of ntr works end, at the exact moment the ntred person learns that he got ntred and we never get to see their reaction.
The first story legit, tennis one I felt sad but HEY... idk :( the last story ;)
